actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Commerce, Transportation and Tourism.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Commerce, Transportation and Tourism

official_title: A bill to give priority to claims of governmental units pursuant to the Comprehensive Environmental Response, Compensation, and Liability Act of 1980, and the Solid Waste Disposal Act, for costs incurred to respond to hazards created by release of hazardous substances, except for claims arising from releases into navigable waters.
subjects: Liability for toxic substances pollution damages
subjects_top_term: Liability for toxic substances pollution damages

summary.text: Amends the Comprehensive Environmental Response, Compensation, and Liability Act of 1980 and the Solid Waste Disposal Act to give priority to claims of governmental units for costs incurred in responding to hazards created by release of hazardous substances, except for claims arising from releases into navigable waters.

titles.title: A bill to give priority to claims of governmental units pursuant to the Comprehensive Environmental Response, Compensation, and Liability Act of 1980, and the Solid Waste Disposal Act, for costs incurred to respond to hazards created by release of hazardous substances, except for claims arising from releases into navigable waters.
